centroid.description: Spectral centroid in Hz (20–20000), zero-padded to 5 digits (e.g. 00250 = 250 Hz, 20000 = 20 kHz).

inharm.description: Inharmonicity bucket, 0 = pure harmonic (most tonal), 10 = fully noisy (least tonal). Always two digits, zero-padded (e.g. 00, 10).

texture.description: Texture mode, single lowercase letter: d = monophonic (most simple), c = biphonic, b = polyphonic, a = homophonic (most complex).

blend.description: Blend amount as % × 10, zero-padded to 4 digits (e.g. 0100 = 10.0%, 1000 = 100%).

description: TIM (prefix), centroid (5), inharm (2), texture (1), blend (4). Example: TIM0025000a0100 (centroid 250 Hz → 00250, inharm → 00, texture → a, blend 10.0% → 0100).
